attributes.action: Stop Train Companies Like NXEC banning Trainspotters from Stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As A trainspotter all my life I am disgusted at the latest news that NXEC are trying to ban spotters from stations, despite Network Rail (who own the stations )saying that spotters are welcome and the BTP saying that there is NO law to stop spotters from endulging in their hobby. Oh yes and not to mention this goverment who say that spotters can be eyes and ears against terrorists(so why go and let people like NXEC kick us in the teeth??)
